org.taverna.server.master.rest

Interface TavernaServerListenersREST.Property

  • Enclosing interface:
    TavernaServerListenersREST

    @RolesAllowed(value="ROLE_tavernauser")
public static interface TavernaServerListenersREST.Property
    This represents a single property attached of an event listener.
    Author:
    Donal Fellows

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getValue()
      Get the value of the particular property of an event listener attached to a workflow run.
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response options()
      Get an outline of the operations supported.
      String setValue(String value)
      Set the value of the particular property of an event listener attached to a workflow run.

    • Method Detail

      • getValue

        @GET
 @Path(value="/")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
 @Nonnull
String getValue()
        Get the value of the particular property of an event listener attached to a workflow run.
        Returns:
        The value of the property.

      • setValue

        @PUT
 @Path(value="/")
 @Consumes(value="text/plain")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
 @Nonnull
String setValue(@Nonnull
                                                                                                               String value)
                                                                                                        throws NoUpdateException,
                                                                                                               NoListenerException
        Set the value of the particular property of an event listener attached to a workflow run. Changing the value of the property may cause the listener to alter its behaviour significantly.
        Parameters:
        value - The value to set the property to.
        Returns:
        The value of the property after being set.
        Throws:
        NoUpdateException - If the user is not permitted to update the run.
        NoListenerException - If the property is in the wrong format.

      • options

        @OPTIONS
 @Path(value="/")
javax.ws.rs.core.Response options()
        Get an outline of the operations supported.
